about_the_game:
Like cats? How about cafes? Every game could use a coffee pit-stop and/or kitty companions. With colourful tiles, character pages of everything from rainbow lights to yarn balls, and 150 cat sprite sheets, this set has you covered for all your feline and/or caffeinated needs. After all, cafes are the ultimate cozy gaming space, and cats make great collectables!

Includes:

- Over 1000 variations of cat sprites, covering a dozen breeds from Munchkin to Maine Coon, Sphinx to Scottish Fold, Turkish Angora to Russian Blue to Norwegian Forest Cat
- .Psd files of all cats with addable accessories like collars and flowers
- Animated doors, cat doors, and cat toys
- A2-5, one Tile B full of colourful cat accessories and decals, one of all things cafe, and one of shelves/tables/structures in 10 variations (black, white, multiple woods, and various colours) that work for both feline care and coffee shops separately
- A cafe-themed window, a cat-themed window, and custom icons for both themes

And if you want more detailed points:

- 2x Tile A2 with counters, tables, carpets, and borders
- 2x Tile A4 with wooden, windowed, and wallpapered walls
- Extra tile A3 with wallpaper colour variants
- A5 with flooring and stairs in carpet, wooden planks, wooden/coloured/metal/checkerboard tiles, marble slabs, and paw-printed tiles.
- Tile B of cat food, accessories, litter boxes, cardboard boxes, carriers, toys, yarn, food/water bowls, grooming tools, paw print trails, various decals, and even a hairball
- Tile C in 10 colour variations of borders, windows, tables, railing, chairs, benches, cupboards, shelves, menu/signs, and paintings
- Tile D of potted plants, hanging baskets, wisteria, light fixtures, bulletin boards, a calendar, posters/signs, and kitchen equipment including: white/black/metal counters, metal wracks, a fridge, sink, stove, fryer, barista machine, blender, a POS system, recycling/garbage, various dishes, bottles, and baked goods
- Tile E of variants and pre-made clutter to overlay or parallax, including glass food displays and plenty of delectable treats
- Doors, with and without cat doors, and separate cat doors all in the 10 Tile C colour variants
- Hanging lights, wall sconces, fairy lights, and track LEDs in the 10 Tile C colour variants, including track LEDs in a rainbow of colours
- 4 Face pages including cat silhouettes, collars in a rainbow of colours, and paws
- Custom icon page including shrunk versions of face files, cat accessories, and cafe paraphernalia
- Custom window with coffee cup curser in 9 different colours and alternates with paw print curser
- 150 sprite pages for a grand total of 1200 cats covering the following breeds: American Shorthair, Siamese, Birman, Bombay, Russian Blue, Bengal, Burmilla, Ocicat, Singapura, Egyptian Mau, Japanese Bobtail, Manx, Scottish Fold, Sokoke, Chausie, Small Savannah Cat, Munchkin, Abyssinian, Burmese, Sphynx, Lykoi, Devon Rex, Cornish Rex, Oriental Shorthair, Turkish Angora, Himalayan, Somali, British Longhair, Ragamuffin, Ragdoll, Selkirk Rex, American Curl, American Bobtail, Cymric, Exotic Shorthair, Persian, Siberian, Norwegian Forest, Maine Coon, plus a few robots, spirits, and fantasy versions.
- .psd files of cats for different body types with optional shadows, collars, bows, flowers, and eye-patches

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
